name: Robo13
description:
Fight as Robo13 through floor after floor against evil mutant cyborgs, while collecting power ups and saving humans.

The year is 20XX and one conglomerate has developed mutant clones of humans in an assembly line that enhances them with cybernetics. They were meant to be a disposable military force to take control of the world, but they lost control of the whole tower facility and the production machines have been working full time. 

Robo13 is a project that takes a human volunteer and enhances them with cybernetics in order to take on the facility and keep the mutant cyborg numbers down so that they do not escape into the rest of the world.

Fight level after level of mutant cyborgs by collecting compatible bits from their corpses.  Rescue humans who have been trapped and abandoned in the tower. 

Play with keyboard only, mouse and keyboard, or most HID compatible controllers.

  • Move: WASD/Left Stick
  • Shoot: LMB/Numpad/Right Stick
  • Roll: Spacebar/Numpad 0/Shoulder buttons
